udaba: Noma yini ethatha isikhala futhi inesisindo
i-athomu: Iyunithi encane yodaba engabamba iqhaza ekuphenduleni kwamakhemikhali
ingqamuzana: Iqembu lama-athomu amabili noma ngaphezulu ahlanganiswe ndawonye ngokwekhemikhali
isici: Into ehlanzekile eyenziwe ngohlobo olulodwa kuphela lwe-athomu
inhlanganisela: Into eyenziwe ngezinto ezimbili noma ngaphezulu ezihlukene ezihlanganiswe ndawonye ngamakhemikhali
isimo sendaba: Indlela udaba olukhona ngayo (okuqinile, uketshezi, igesi, i-plasma)
amandla adonsela phansi: Amandla aheha izinto ngobuningi ziye kwenye
phoqa: Phusha noma udonse okungabangela into ukuthi isheshise noma ishintshe indlela eya ngakuyo
umsindo: Uhlobo lwamandla oluhamba njengamagagasi endaweni ethile
ukushisa: Ukudluliswa kwamandla ashisayo ukusuka entweni efudumele ukuya entweni epholile
izinga lokushisa: Isilinganiso sokuthi into ishisa noma ibanda kangakanani
isimo sezulu: Izimo zezulu ezimaphakathi endaweni ethile esikhathini eside
i-ecosystem: Umphakathi wezinto eziphilayo ezisebenzisanayo kanye nendawo yazo engaphili
inani labantu: Iqembu lezinto eziphilayo zohlobo olufanayo ezihlala endaweni ethile
ukuziphendukela kwemvelo: Inqubo lapho inani labantu bezinto eziphilayo lishintsha khona ngokuhamba kwesikhathi
uhlelo lomkhathi: Ilanga nezinto eziboshelwe kulo ngamandla adonsela phansi
indawo yonke: Konke okukhona, okuhlanganisa izinto, amandla, indawo, nesikhathi
